xrx:service.xrx:description: gets the collection id, the name of the node and the first character for the register. collection_type defines if it is a private or public collection. collectionsearch:createResults takes all charters checks if the element $node_name exists and creates an resultXml. The xml is saved in a session variable _collectionSearchAsXml and a json will be created for jquery functions
